title: Are we forgetting that, at its core, this is a game of strategy, not skill?
body:
Everyone is focusing *far* too much on the champions, when they are only tools with which to execute your strategy, like units in an RTS (remember that League of Legends is a spiritual successor to a Warcraft III mod). What you should *really* be focusing on is YOU, as a Summoner. 

Strategies you have to work on, independent of champion:
 - Minion control
 - Trading
 - Rotations
 - Shot calling
 - Vision control
 - Item builds
 - Matchups
 - Roaming
 - Map pressure
 - Towers
 - Positioning
 - Jungle routes
AND THOSE ARE JUST THE BASICS!

**I'm speaking to myself as much as everyone else here when I say that seeing someone on the enemy team pick 'that one OP champ' and saying "gg" is like if we saw Germany develop chemical weapons in World War I and immediately surrendered.**

replies.body:
It's a different kind of skill. It's more than being able to master a champion or "make plays" or get an early lead or have a successful teamfight. It involves being able to watch enemy movement patterns, predict where enemies are even if you can't see them, where they're going and why, when to spot and take advantage of opportunities, identifying who the most valuable asset and highest priority target on the team is and who and why the enemy will target first, etc.

Strategy can help you take advantage of bad situations. I once went 0/6 as Wukong in a lane, so instead of trying to face the top-laner head on, I focused on keeping the lanes pushed and defended as the rest of my team dealt with the enemy and my fuckup. I smashed almost all of the turrets and inhibitors and ultimately won us the game.
Someone could use strategy playing something like kogmaw as an auto turret and probably get to plat.
Mechanical trashers always want more strategy
yet without skill you stay in bronze 5, you need both

I am a skillless idiot and managed to get to gold the past 2 seasons.

Where is your god now?

He is saying that both are important. You could be very skilled at micro play and suck at macro play and make gold as well.

Having both is what lets you get further.
yet if you understand and know the above mention then you are light years ahead of someone who dont regardless of how well they can right click
